statements: SELECT * FROM historical_data WHERE sensor_id = 1
SELECT temperature, humidity FROM historical_data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-01-31'
SELECT MAX(temperature) AS max_temp FROM historical_data WHERE sensor_id = 2
SELECT AVG(temperature) AS avg_temp, AVG(humidity) AS avg_humidity FROM historical_data WHERE humidity > 50
SELECT sensor_id, timestamp, airflow FROM historical_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM historical_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT sensor_id, temperature, humidity FROM historical_data WHERE airflow > 50 ORDER BY temperature DESC
SELECT sensor_id, humidity FROM historical_data WHERE temperature < 20 AND humidity > 60
SELECT * FROM historical_data WHERE humidity BETWEEN 40 AND 60 AND temperature > 25 ORDER BY timestamp
SELECT sensor_id, timestamp FROM historical_data WHERE temperature = (SELECT MAX(temperature) FROM historical_data)
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, location, sensor_type, installation_date FROM HVAC_System_Sensors;
SELECT * FROM HVAC_System_Sensors WHERE location = 'Room A';
SELECT sensor_name, installation_date FROM HVAC_System_Sensors ORDER BY installation_date DESC;
SELECT sensor_name, location FROM HVAC_System_Sensors WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature';
SELECT * FROM HVAC_Maintenance_Logs WHERE maintenance_type = 'Filter Replacement';
SELECT * FROM HVAC_System_Sensors;
SELECT sensor_name, location, installation_date FROM HVAC_System_Sensors ORDER BY installation_date DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, location, sensor_type FROM HVAC_System_Sensors WHERE location = 'Room A' AND sensor_type = 'Temperature';
SELECT * FROM HVAC_Maintenance_Logs WHERE maintenance_type = 'Filter Replacement' ORDER BY maintenance_date ASC;
SELECT sensor_name, maintenance_date, maintenance_type FROM HVAC_System_Sensors INNER JOIN HVAC_Maintenance_Logs ON HVAC_System_Sensors.sensor_id = HVAC_Maintenance_Logs.sensor_id;
SELECT * FROM HVAC_Sensors
SELECT sensor_name, location, sensor_type FROM HVAC_Sensors WHERE id = 1
SELECT sensor_name, installation_date FROM HVAC_Sensors ORDER BY installation_date DESC
SELECT * FROM HVAC_Readings WHERE reading_value > 50
SELECT sensor_name, reading_time FROM HVAC_Sensors JOIN HVAC_Readings ON HVAC_Sensors.id = HVAC_Readings.sensor_id
SELECT * FROM HVAC_Sensors ORDER BY installation_date DESC;
SELECT sensor_name, location, sensor_type FROM HVAC_Sensors WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature';
SELECT sensor_name, reading_value, reading_time FROM HVAC_Sensors JOIN HVAC_Readings ON HVAC_Sensors.id = HVAC_Readings.sensor_id;

SELECT sensor_name, maintenance_date, maintenance_type, maintenance_description FROM HVAC_Sensors JOIN Maintenance_Log ON HVAC_Sensors.id = Maintenance_Log.sensor_id WHERE maintenance_type = 'Scheduled';

SELECT sensor_name, location, reading_value, reading_time FROM HVAC_Sensors JOIN HVAC_Readings ON HVAC_Sensors.id = HVAC_Readings.sensor_id WHERE reading_time >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY reading_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM HVAC_Systems;
SELECT system_id, location, installation_date FROM HVAC_Systems;
SELECT * FROM Maintenance_Records WHERE maintenance_type = 'filter replacement';
SELECT system_id, MAX(reading_value) AS max_reading FROM Sensor_Data GROUP BY system_id;
SELECT system_id, prediction_result, confidence_level FROM Predictive_Maintenance WHERE confidence_level > 0.8 ORDER BY prediction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM HVAC_Systems;
SELECT system_id, location, installation_date FROM HVAC_Systems ORDER BY installation_date DESC;
SELECT system_id, location, last_maintenance_date FROM HVAC_Systems WHERE last_maintenance_date IS NOT NULL;
SELECT record_id, maintenance_type, technician FROM Maintenance_Records WHERE maintenance_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT system_id, sensor_type, reading_value, timestamp FROM Sensor_Data WHERE reading_value > 100;
SELECT * FROM HVAC_Systems;
SELECT location, installation_date FROM HVAC_Systems ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT record_id, maintenance_date, technician FROM Maintenance_Records WHERE technician = 'John Doe';
SELECT MIN(temperature) AS min_temp, MAX(temperature) AS max_temp FROM Sensor_Data WHERE system_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT model_name, trained_date, accuracy FROM Prediction_Models WHERE accuracy > 0.8 ORDER BY trained_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM HVAC_Systems WHERE location = 'Office Building';
SELECT * FROM Maintenance_Records WHERE maintenance_date > '2020-01-01' ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC;
SELECT system_id, location FROM HVAC_Systems JOIN Sensor_Data ON HVAC_Systems.system_id = Sensor_Data.system_id WHERE temperature > 25 AND humidity < 50;
SELECT model_name, trained_date FROM Prediction_Models WHERE accuracy > 0.8 ORDER BY trained_date ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM Alerts JOIN Prediction_Models ON Alerts.prediction_id = Prediction_Models.model_id WHERE alert_type = 'Critical' ORDER BY alert_date DESC;
